rule: The output must always be in English.
input: A guitarist performing under the moonlight at a beach bonfire. The image should feel intimate and soulful.
output: A charismatic guitarist performs under softly glowing moonlight over a warm beach bonfire. His amplified guitar fills the air with soulful melodies, while the illuminated instruments on his desk add to the music. The intimate ambiance of the evening emphasizes the emotional connection between him and his music, all set against a clean, minimalistic background.
complianceText:
The output describes the subject (a charismatic guitarist) and some of his characteristics (performing, amplified guitar, soulful melodies). It details the timing and lighting (softly glowing moonlight, warm beach bonfire, illuminated instruments). It describes the background (clean, minimalistic). It conveys the feeling (intimate ambiance, emotional connection). The description is a single paragraph and does not exceed 80 words.

OK
